Softkey Label
Progress Tones
Ring Tone
f1=440,f2=480,c=200/400; Syntax: f1=val,f2=val[,c=on1/off1[-on2/off2[-on3/off3]]]; (Frequencies are in Hz and cadence on and off are in 10ms).
Dial Tone
f1=350,f2=440; Syntax: f1=val,f2=val[,c=on1/off1[-on2/off2[-on3/off3]]]; (Frequencies are in Hz and cadence on and off are in 10ms).
Message Waiting
f1=350,f2=440,c=10/10; Syntax: f1=val,f2=val[,c=on1/off1[-on2/off2[-on3/off3]]]; (Frequencies are in Hz and cadence on and off are in 10ms).
Ring Back Tone
f1=440,f2=480,c=200/400; Syntax: f1=val,f2=val[,c=on1/off1[-on2/off2[-on3/off3]]]; (Frequencies are in Hz and cadence on and off are in 10ms).
Call Waiting Tone
f1=440,f2=440,c=25/525; Syntax: f1=val,f2=val[,c=on1/off1[-on2/off2[-on3/off3]]]; (Frequencies are in Hz and cadence on and off are in 10ms).
Busy Tone
f1=480,f2=620,c=50/50; Syntax: f1=val,f2=val[,c=on1/off1[-on2/off2[-on3/off3]]]; (Frequencies are in Hz and cadence on and off are in 10ms).
Reorder Tone
f1=480,f2=620,c=25/25; Syntax: f1=val,f2=val[,c=on1/off1[-on2/off2[-on3/off3]]]; (Frequencies are in Hz and cadence on and off are in 10ms).
